original_text: And he shall kill the lamb of the guilt offering. And the priest shall take some of the blood of the guilt offering and put it on the lobe of the right ear of him who is to be cleansed, and on the thumb of his right hand and on the big toe of his right foot.
korean_text: 속건제의 어린 양을 잡아서 제사장은 그 속건제물의 피를 가져다가 정결함을 받을 자의 오른쪽 귓부리와 오른쪽 엄지 손가락과 오른쪽 엄지 발가락에 바를 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall kill the lamb of the guilt offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 속건 제물의 어린 양을 죽일 것이니라.

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall take some of the blood of the guilt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 속건 제물의 피를 얼마간 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and put it on the lobe of the right ear of him who is to be cleansed,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 정결을 받게 될 그 사람의 오른쪽 이귀에 바를 것이니라

sentences.original_text: and on the thumb of his right hand
and on the big toe of his right foot.
